Package tripleplay.particle

Class Summary
Effector Encapsulates a single effect on a particle, for example, moving it based on its current velocity.
Emitter Emits and updates particles according to a particle system configuration.
Generator Adds particles to an emitter according to some policy.
Initializer Used to initialize a new particle.
ParticleBuffer Contains the basic metadata for an array of particles: position, velocity, scale, rotation, birth time, lifespan.
Particles Manages all particle emitters.
ParticleShader A custom shader designed for shading particles.
